title.narrative: Program to Strengthen Self Reliance and Resilience of Tibetan Communities in South Asia

description.narrative: (India): .This mechanism will strengthen the resilience of Tibetan communities in India and Nepal by improving livelihoods and strengthening local institutions. .With FY 2019 funding, the implementing partner will provide technical assistance to strengthen key Tibetan institutions like the Central Tibetan Administration, through initiatives to improve organizational effectiveness, capacity, and sustainability; and to improve the leadership and professional skills of the organization's staff. The activity includes two main components: Sustainable Livelihoods Improvement and Strengthening Tibetan Institutions and Cultural Resilience. Within the first component, recognizing that income, employment, education, and health are closely interconnected determinants of sustainable livelihoods improvement and self-reliance, the activity will continue its work to increase household incomes and reduced underemployment, improve the quality of teaching and learning in Tibetan schools and access to higher education, increase access to affordable quality health care and reduce the burden of impoverishing disease, increase the participation and ownership of local communities in the development process, and increase the specific participation and empowerment of women in the development process. Within component two, the activity will improve the effectiveness, capacity, and sustainability of local institutions serving Tibetan communities and increase the cultural vitality and resilience of Tibetan communities.. .. .
